EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
12 METER VESSEL APOLLO 18, GREY HULL,
THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT IN VICINITY
32-20.00N 023-43.00E ON 08 NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
